successes.title: The Temperfect Mug: Coffee and Tea at The Perfect Temp
successes.description: Never burn your mouth again. Enjoy your hot beverage for hours.

Pledges.description: GET OUR heartfelt gratitude and good vibes. Thanks for supporting us!
GET A hand-made postcard (made by our hands) from Joeveo Headquarters in Wake Forest, NC!

GET A MUG: a brushed stainless-steel mug with fashionable Joeveo-orange grip, delivered to your door in the contiguous US. For shipping to Alaska, Hawaii and Canada please add $15, to other countries with trackable shipping + $36.

GET A MUG, PINK or BLUE: a brushed stainless-steel mug with your choice of either rose or cobalt blue sleeve, delivered to your door in the contiguous US.  For shipping to Alaska, Hawaii and Canada please add $15, to other countries with trackable shipping + $36.

GET A BLACK OXIDE MUG: a cool, smooth, mottled coating and bead-blasted droplet logo. Please see our product description for details and pictures. Shipping to all 50 states and Canada is included, to other countries with trackable shipping + $20.

GET A TITANIA MUG: a flat, blue-black, ultra-hard coated mug with uncoated droplet logo. Please see our product description for details and pictures. Worldwide shipping (to places with trackable shipping) is included.

GET A HAND-ENGRAVED BLACK OXIDE MUG: a smooth, mottled coating, and exclusive to this version, beautiful hand-engraving done by a local Raleigh, NC artist. Each mug will be different. Please see our product description for details and pictures. Worldwide shipping (to places with trackable shipping) is included.
